title: DNS Proxy (com.apple.dnsProxy.managed)
description: Use this section to configure a DNS proxy network extension

AppBundleIdentifier.title: App Bundle ID
AppBundleIdentifier.description: The bundle identifier of the app containing the DNS proxy network extension.

ProviderBundleIdentifier.title: Provider Bundle ID
ProviderBundleIdentifier.description: The bundle identifier of the DNS proxy network extension to use. Declaring the bundle identifier is useful for apps that contain more than one DNS proxy extension.

ProviderConfiguration.title: Provider Custom Configuration
ProviderConfiguration.description: The dictionary of vendor-specific configuration items.

DNSProxyUUID.title: DNS Proxy UUID
DNSProxyUUID.description: A globally-unique identifier for this DNS proxy configuration. Managed apps with the same 'DNSProxyUUID' in their app attributes have their DNS lookups traffic processed by the proxy. This key is required for user enrollments.
